page.title: 06Housing
page.content: A survey on property. The children from Woolaston School counted 482 properties in the parish of Woolaston.The children then counted the newer houses that have been built in the last 20 years-this figure was 195. Therefore 40.5% of the houses are relatively new. The influx of newcomers from away has caused some difficulties between the original and new inhabitants. One advantage to the village brought by the new housing has been the retention of the old village school. In other parts of Gloucestershire, village schools have been closing down.(see photo) Number of children in Woolaston School, 1985 - 182.
